event.title: celebrates all Hindu and Sikh fesivals, including Diwali

data.event: Bora celebrates all Hindu and Sikh fesivals, including Diwali, Holi, Gurpurab, and Raksha Bandhan, but Janamastami is the most popular festival in the village and is celebrated with great pomp and show by Hindus and Sikhs.

event.title: Holi, Gurpurab, and Raksha Bandhan, but Janamastami is the most popular festival in the village and is celebrated

data.event: Bora celebrates all Hindu and Sikh fesivals, including Diwali, Holi, Gurpurab, and Raksha Bandhan, but Janamastami is the most popular festival in the village and is celebrated with great pomp and show by Hindus and Sikhs.

event.title: this day Sri Mahakali temple is decorated

data.event: On this day Sri Mahakali temple is decorated and the goddess Mahakali is worshipped with prasad prepared by the temple administrators and offered to the goddess.
